title: Paper Doll Costume, "Paper Doll Costume in White with Red Roses", 1876–80
medium: Lithograph, brush and watercolor on cream heavy wove paper
description: White dress lined with red roses at the neckline and roses on the upper portion of her dress.  White lace sleeves, and many small layers of white ruffle also adorn the dress.  Both back and front of dress depicted.

tombstone.epitaph:
Paper Doll Costume, "Paper Doll Costume in White with Red Roses", 1876–80.
1876–80. Lithograph, brush and watercolor on cream heavy wove paper. Gift of Grace Lincoln Temple. 1937-22-18.
